DOtools 0.4.0
  • Reference

DOtools

R package with functions to make your life easier when working with Seurat.

How to install

Install through github:

devtools::install_github("MarianoRuzJurado/DOtools")

API:

https://marianoruzjurado.github.io/DOtools/

Contribution Guidelines

Raising up an issue in this Github repository might be the fastest way of submitting suggestions and bugs. Alternatively you can write to my email: ruzjurado@med.uni-frankfurt.de
